classmeta.shortdesc: Vertical slider widget for selecting a value from a range.

desc.simpara: A GtkVScale is a vertical scrollbar-like widget that is able to display its adjustment value as text.
There are some configuration issues with this widget when it is used in such a way; please refer to GtkScale for further information.
A GtkVScale that can be given its own GtkAdjustment settings has no configuration issues whatever.
desc.para:
Reasonable settings on an adjustment object for a GtkVScale on a single full page might look something like this:
<?php
$adjustment = &new GtkAdjustment(0, 0, 100, 1, 25, 0); $vscale = &new GtkVScale($adjustment);
?>
This would give a scale of 0 to 100 along the height of the page, and no overlap.
